definitions.usage_note: 可数名词，复数为 obituaries。指报纸、网站等刊登的关于某人去世及生平简介的公告。常见于正式出版物。

sentences.en: The newspaper published an obituary for the late senator.
sentences.zh: 报纸刊登了那位已故参议员的讣告。

sentences.en: She wrote a touching obituary for her grandfather.
sentences.zh: 她为祖父写了一篇感人的讣告。

sentences.en: Obituaries often appear in the back pages of the paper.
sentences.zh: 讣告通常刊登在报纸的后几版。

sentences.en: The family asked a close friend to write an obituary.
sentences.zh: 家人请一位密友撰写讣告。

sentences.en: The local paper published an obituary within two days.
sentences.zh: 当地报纸两天内刊登了讣告。

sentences.en: She found the notice in the obituary column.
sentences.zh: 她在讣告栏找到了这则公告。

sentences.en: He read her obituary in the morning paper.
sentences.zh: 他在早报上读到她的讣告。

death notice.diffs: death notice 较简短；obituary 通常更详细，包含生平简介

sentences.en: A death notice was placed in the classifieds.
sentences.zh: 分类广告中刊登了一则死亡公告。

necrology.diffs: necrology 较正式、学术；obituary 日常更常用

sentences.en: The necrology listed those who had passed in the past year.
sentences.zh: 死亡名单列出了过去一年去世的人。

eulogy.diffs: eulogy 是在葬礼上宣读的口头悼文；obituary 是书面刊登的讣告

sentences.en: His son delivered a heartfelt eulogy at the funeral.
sentences.zh: 他的儿子在葬礼上宣读了感人的悼词。

etymology.origin: 源自拉丁语 obituarius，与 obitus（死亡）相关，obitus 来自 obire（去见、去世），由 ob-（朝向）+ ire（去）构成。

obit.rule: obituary 的非正式缩写形式

sentences.en: Did you see the obit for Professor Smith?
sentences.zh: 你看到史密斯教授的讣告了吗？

common_mistakes.explain: 正确拼写为 obituary，注意 -tuary 而非 -tury。

mnemonics.content: ob-（朝向）+ ire（去）→ 去往（彼岸）→ 去世 → obituary 与死亡相关，指讣告。
